submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        diff = Counter()
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a, b = nums[i], nums[n - i - 1]
            mm = max(abs(0 - a), abs(0 - b), abs(k - a), abs(k - b))
            diff[0] += 1
            diff[mm + 1] -= 1
            diff[mm + 1] += 2
            av = abs(a - b)
            diff[av] -= 1
            diff[av + 1] += 1
        diff = sorted(diff.items())
        # print(diff)
        res = n
        curr = 0
        for k, v in diff:
            curr += v
            # print(k, curr)
            res = min(res, curr)
        return res
